name: data-profiling-dashboard
postCreateCommand: ./startupscript/post-startup.sh jovyan /home/jovyan "${templateOption:cloud}" "${templateOption:login}" && chmod +x /workspace/setup-notebook.sh 2>/dev/null || true && /workspace/setup-notebook.sh 2>/dev/null || (curl -s -o /home/jovyan/Lab_Results_Analysis.ipynb https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SIVerilyDP/workbench-app-devcontainers/master/src/data-profiling-dashboard/Lab_Results_Analysis.ipynb && cp /workspace/run_data_profiling.py /home/jovyan/ 2>/dev/null || true && chown -R jovyan:users /home/jovyan/*.ipynb /home/jovyan/run_data_profiling.py 2>/dev/null || true)
